statements: SELECT * FROM workshops;
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_date, workshop_time FROM workshops WHERE workshop_trainer = 'John Doe';
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_time, workshop_duration FROM workshops WHERE workshop_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT workshop_name, maximum_capacity FROM workshops WHERE workshop_trainer = 'Jane Smith' AND workshop_duration >= 90;
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_date FROM workshops WHERE maximum_capacity >= 20 ORDER BY workshop_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM workshops WHERE workshop_id = 1;
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_date, workshop_time FROM workshops WHERE workshop_duration > 120 ORDER BY workshop_date DESC;
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_trainer as trainer_name, maximum_capacity FROM workshops WHERE workshop_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY maximum_capacity DESC;
SELECT COUNT(workshop_id) as total_workshops, workshop_trainer FROM workshops GROUP BY workshop_trainer;

SELECT workshop_name, workshop_duration, maximum_capacity, CONCAT(workshop_name, ' - ', workshop_trainer) AS workshop_details FROM workshops WHERE maximum_capacity > 20 ORDER BY workshop_duration ASC, workshop_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM workshops;
SELECT title, date FROM workshops WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, title, date FROM workshops WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT description FROM workshops WHERE id = 3;
SELECT title, trainer, date FROM training_sessions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM workshops WHERE id = 1
SELECT title, description FROM workshops WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, title, location FROM workshops WHERE title LIKE '%workshop%' AND location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM training_sessions WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT title, trainer, duration FROM training_sessions WHERE trainer = 'John Doe'
SELECT * FROM workshops;
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_date, workshop_time FROM workshops WHERE workshop_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY workshop_date DESC;
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_duration FROM workshops WHERE workshop_duration > 60;
SELECT workshop_name, trainer_name, specialty FROM workshops w JOIN trainers t ON w.workshop_id = t.trainer_id;
SELECT p.participant_name, w.workshop_name FROM participants p JOIN workshops w ON p.workshop_id = w.workshop_id;
SELECT * FROM workshops WHERE workshop_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_date, workshop_time FROM workshops WHERE workshop_duration > 2;

SELECT workshops.workshop_name, trainers.trainer_name FROM workshops JOIN participants ON workshops.workshop_id = participants.workshop_id JOIN trainers ON trainers.trainer_id = participants.participant_id;
SELECT workshop_name, COUNT(participant_id) AS total_participants FROM workshops JOIN participants ON workshops.workshop_id = participants.workshop_id GROUP BY workshop_name;

SELECT workshop_name, trainer_name FROM workshops JOIN participants ON workshops.workshop_id = participants.workshop_id JOIN trainers ON trainers.trainer_id = participants.trainer_id WHERE trainers.specialty = 'SQL';
SELECT * FROM workshops;
SELECT workshop_name, instructor_name, workshop_date FROM workshops;
SELECT session_name, description FROM sessions WHERE capacity > 10;
SELECT workshop_name, instructor_name FROM workshops WHERE capacity >= 20 ORDER BY workshop_date DESC;

SELECT attendees.attendee_name, workshops.workshop_name, registrations.registration_date FROM attendees JOIN registrations ON attendees.attendee_id = registrations.attendee_id JOIN workshops ON registrations.workshop_id = workshops.workshop_id;
SELECT workshop_name, instructor_name, workshop_date FROM workshops;
SELECT session_name, session_date, description FROM sessions WHERE capacity > 10 ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT attendee_name, email_address FROM attendees WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;

SELECT workshop_name, workshops.capacity, COUNT(registration_id) AS registrations_count FROM workshops LEFT JOIN registrations ON workshops.workshop_id = registrations.workshop_id GROUP BY workshops.workshop_id;
SELECT workshop_name, instructor_name, workshop_date FROM workshops WHERE workshop_date >= '2022-01-01' AND workshop_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM workshops;
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_date, workshop_location FROM workshops WHERE workshop_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT workshop_location FROM workshops WHERE workshop_duration > '2 hours';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT workshop_name, feedback_text, rating FROM workshops INNER JOIN feedback ON workshops.workshop_id = feedback.workshop_id ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM workshops WHERE workshop_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_location FROM workshops WHERE workshop_time < '13:00:00'
SELECT employee_name, department, position FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY employee_name ASC
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_date, COUNT(*) FROM registrations GROUP BY workshop_name, workshop_date
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC
